Data.value: If you have another card not listed here or would like to leave the scheme, please contact us on
Since joining Clubcard you may have collected various Clubcards. Below are the card numbers that we hold in this account.
If any of the cards listed are no longer in regular use, we advise you to change to a newer card in order to keep your details current. See

If you have another card not listed here or would like to leave the scheme, please contact us on 0800 591 688. You can also add one other person from your household to your account, the other person will need to be present when you call.
All Clubcards against which you earn points (even occasionally), are kept in your account.
You can also add one other person from your household to your account, the other person will need to be present when you call.
* Free from BT landlines. Other providers vary. Calls may be recorded.
** Charged at local rate from mobiles and private telephones.
